production.name: Carrasco & Domingo Films S.A. de C.V.
Consejo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes (CONACULTA)

name: Saawariya
tagline: Two souls arrive in a small town, one on vacation, the other to meet a lover. They spend the most magical dream-like days of their lives in that town... with each other.

name: Female Perversions
tagline: An ambitious female attorney wallows in excess and meaningless sex with both male and female partners, while dealing with her personal life problems including helping her kleptomaniac sister.

name: Princess Kaiulani
tagline: The true story of a Hawaiian princess' attempts to maintain the independence of the island against the threat of American colonization.

name: Séraphine
tagline: Based on the life of French painter Séraphine de Senlis.

name: Venom
tagline: A pack of teenagers run for their lives through the swamps of Louisiana, as they are chased by Mr. Jangles, a man possessed by 13 evil souls who is relentless in his pursuit of new victims.

name: Paprika
tagline: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patient's dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist can stop it: Paprika.

name: Delhi-6
tagline: A story about love, hope and self-discovery set in the walled city of Delhi (zip code 6) and its chaotic but touching life that forces us to ask questions about ourselves.

name: Raanjhanaa
tagline: A small-town boy needs to break through the class divide to gain acceptance from his childhood sweetheart who is in love with big city ideals.

name: The Rising: Ballad of Mangal Pandey
tagline: Based on the life and times of Mangal Pandey, 1857: The Rising is a film about the leader of the 1857 mutiny and his fight against the British rule.

name: Real Men
tagline: A womanizing CIA agent and an insecure insurance agent are paired together to make sure a deal goes through with aliens for the future of mankind.

name: The Wildest Dream
tagline: Uses astonishing visuals to tell the intersecting stories of George Mallory, the first man to attempt a summit of Mount Everest, and Conrad Anker, the mountaineer who finds Mallory's frozen remains 75 years later.

name: Control
tagline: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

name: Where the Truth Lies
tagline: K. O'Connor, a young journalist known for her celebrity profiles, is consumed with discovering the truth behind a long-buried incident that affected the lives and careers of showbiz team Vince Collins and Lanny Morris.

name: Goodbye Solo
tagline: Two men form an unlikely friendship that will change both of their lives forever.

name: Edge of Seventeen
tagline: A teenager copes with his sexuality on the last day of school in 1984. It shows him coping with being gay and being with friends.

name: Parents
tagline: A young boy living in 1950s suburbia begins to wonder where his parents get their meat from...

name: The Cove
tagline: Using state-of-the-art equipment, a group of activists, led by renowned dolphin trainer Ric O'Barry, infiltrate a cove near Taijii, Japan to expose both a shocking instance of animal abuse and a serious threat to human health.

name: Beastmaster 2: Through the Portal of Time
My Blueberry Nights
tagline: A young woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.

name: MirrorMask
tagline: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a 15-year old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.

name: Duma
tagline: An orphaned cheetah becomes the best friend and pet of a young boy living in South Africa.

name: Nelly & Monsieur Arnaud
tagline: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.

name: Angel Town
tagline: Tenant helps landlord fight off local street gang.

name: Anjaana Anjaani
tagline: After numerous attempts at suicide fail, a couple decide to live it up, and then kill themselves on New Year's Day.

name: Zatoichi
tagline: The blind masseur/swordsman comes to a town in control of warring gangs, and while bunking with a farming family, he meets two women with their own agenda.

name: Marlene
tagline: Retrospective on the career of enigmatic screen diva Marlene Dietrich.

name: Heavy
tagline: The life of an overweight, unhappy cook is changed after a kind, beautiful college drop-out comes to work as a waitress at he and his mother's road-side restaurant.

name: An American Rhapsody
tagline: A young Hungarian girl struggles to find her place in the world when she's reunited with her parents in the USA years after she was left behind during their flight from the communist country in the 1950s.

name: The Adventures of Mark Twain
tagline: Tom Sawyer, Becky Thatcher and Huck Finn join Mark Twain on his airship to meet Halley's Comet.

name: Generation Iron
tagline: A documentary that follows top bodybuilders as they train to compete in the Mr. Olympia competition.

name: I Hate Luv Storys
tagline: Jay doesn't believe in love Stories, and Simran, is a girl who's in love with the idea of Love itself.

name: Higher Ground
tagline: A chronicle of one woman's lifelong struggle with her faith.

name: Street Knight
tagline: A former cop returns to challenge a plot to escalate gang violence in the streets of Los Angeles.

name: Jai Ho
tagline: An ex-army officer initiates a unique idea of propagating social responsibility among ordinary people and in doing so, crosses paths with a powerful political family.

name: Arctic Tale
tagline: Two narratives -- the life cycle of a mother walrus and her calf, and the life of a polar bear and her cubs -- are used to illustrate the harsh realities of existence in the Arctic.

name: The Crossing Guard
tagline: Freddie Gale is a seedy jeweler who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.

name: Children of the Revolution
tagline: Few knew that Stalin spent his last night in the arms of a young Australian woman. Few still knew that their "love-child" brought Australia to the brink of civil war. Until now ...

name: The Last Days of Chez Nous
Breakfast on Pluto

production.name: Northern Ireland Film and Television Commission

tagline: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

name: Après Vous
tagline: Antoine (Auteuil) saves Louis (Garcia) from hanging himself, though in his attempt to get Louis back on his feet, Antoine gets caught in a romantic triangle.

name: Déjà Vu
tagline: L.A. shop owner Dana and Englishman Sean meet and fall in love at first sight, but Sean is married and Dana is to marry her business partner Alex.

name: I.O.U.S.A.
tagline: Few are aware that America may be on the brink of a financial meltdown. I.O.U.S.A. explores the country's shocking current fiscal condition and ways to avoid a national economic disaster.

name: Latter Days
tagline: A promiscuous gay party animal falls for a young Mormon missionary, leading to crisis, cliché, and catastrophe.

name: Deep in the Heart
tagline: An alcoholic man refocuses himself on putting kids through college via 4H and FFA scholarship donations. Guiding him is a spiritual figure he calls "The Bearded Man".

name: Sarah Landon and the Paranormal Hour
tagline: A 17-year-old girl has mysterious encounters with paranormal activity in the small town of Pine Valley.

name: Ballets Russes
tagline: Ballets Russes is an intimate portrait of a group of pioneering artists -- now in their 70s, 80s and 90s -- who gave birth to modern ballet.

name: The Battle of Algiers
tagline: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

name: Charly
tagline: Sam Roberts thinks he has all the answers: the purpose of life, the meaning of love, the plan for a perfect future. Until Charly walks into his life.

name: Faraway, So Close!
tagline: A group of angels in the German capital look longingly upon the life of humans.

name: Factotum
tagline: This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

name: Waxwork
tagline: A wax museum owner uses his horror exhibits to unleash evil on the world.

name: Bulletproof
tagline: A group of dangerous terrorists succeeds to get hold of a tank of the army and all its crew.

name: Don
tagline: A simple man (Vijay) from the city of mumbai is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as the Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. But things go wrong, the officer is killed and now vijay is on his own, with only his lover (Roma) and a lame ex con artist to help him to prove his innocence.

name: Parineeta
tagline: The lifelong romance between Lolita (Balan) and Shekar (Khan) is upset by the arrival of another man.

name: 13 Assassins
tagline: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

name: After Life
tagline: After death, people have just one week to choose only a memory to keep for eternity.

name: Nicotina
tagline: A real-time dark comedy about a science geek who tangles with a clutch of Russian gangsters after he delivers them the wrong computer disk.

name: Sphinx
tagline: Egyptologist Erica Baron finds more than she bargained for during her long-planned trip to The Land of the Pharoahs - murder, theft, betrayal, love, and a mummy's curse!

name: Brigham City
tagline: The sheriff of a small Utah community searches for a serial killer.

name: Rampage
tagline: Liberal district attorney decides to seek the death penalty for a man who slaughtered a family at Christmastime, then drank their blood. He escapes, though, and starts killing again.

name: Saint Ralph
tagline: Saint Ralph is the unlikely story of Ralph Walker, a ninth grader who outran everyone's expectations except his own in his bold quest of trying to win the 1954 Boston Marathon.

name: Little Monsters
tagline: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

name: Darling Companion
tagline: The story of a woman who loves her dog more than her husband. And then her husband loses the dog.

name: The Toxic Avenger Part II
tagline: The Toxic Avenger travels to Tokyo to search for his father and leaves his home Tromaville open to complete domination by an evil corporation.

name: Anna Karenina
tagline: Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.

name: Into Great Silence
tagline: An examination of life inside the Grande Chartreuse, the head monastery of the reclusive Carthusian Order in France.
